name: Monster Dentist (itch)
description:
Remove all the teeth of the monster before run out of time but be careful don't knock out the monster with excessive pain.

So, who is the real monster here?

Controls:
Move the drill with your mouse. Use left and right click for changing the move direction of the drill. Drill works automatically with teeth on touch.

Credits:
  • Code: Mustafa Önder, Ozan Emirhan Bayyurt 
  • Graphics: Yiğit Savtur 
  • Music: "Funk Game Loop" Kevin MacLeod (incompotect.com) 
  • Sfx: (various) www.freesound.org
